page.title: 13Bondleigh Ecol.Bird Hospital
page.content: {Flanking Bondleigh Bridge}a cottage originally the old forge approximately 500 years old,(now partly modernised but retaining old fire place and bread oven), is occupied by{Miss M.Chetham.} Here,{twenty years}ago, with no training in such work, she started a {Bird Hospital.}Gaining recognition for her skills the{Bird Hospital}grew and today has over{100 maimed,}poisoned and injured birds brought from all over Devon. Buzzards, Owls suffering {toxic spray,}Swans{lead poisoning}(not from 02/5 64/68), various birds, and hedgehogs suffering accidents on roads and farms, etc. The garden of the Old forge is bordered by the winding Taw and upon recovery{birds}are if possible {released into the wild,}water birds on river and others to their natural habitat.
